headline: Consumer VPN Users Express Limited Unmet Needs and Interest in Alternatives
summary: Participants generally reported satisfaction with their current VPN services, but expressed curiosity about alternatives that guarantee reliability and accessibility.

themes.title: Satisfaction with Current VPN Services
themes.description: Many participants reported that their current VPN solutions meet their expectations for accessibility and reliability.

themes.title: Interest in Reliable Alternatives
themes.description: Participants expressed interest in alternative VPN services that guarantee consistent performance and accessibility.

quotes.quote: I might be inclined to trial it

themes.title: Concerns About Accessibility and Reliability
themes.description: Some participants shared experiences where their current VPNs failed to provide expected accessibility or reliability.

quotes.quote: Sometimes the websites I'm using, like market research surveys, won't allow me to complete surveys if I'm on a VPN.
I haven't had any issues or problems whatsoever.
I meant to say no! Just websites that are still blocked with VPN.

themes.title: Price Sensitivity and Value Considerations
themes.description: Participants indicated that pricing would be a significant factor in considering a switch to a new VPN service.

quotes.quote: I would want to know what the price is
I would only be interested if they were bundled with my security service
That would be great if affordable

themes.title: Desire for Enhanced Features
themes.description: Participants expressed a desire for VPN services that offer enhanced features, such as better speed and access to blocked sites.

quotes.quote: I would be curious to learn more about it
That would be nice but I'd have to review it.
I would be very excited and interested about such an alternative service!
